AI Description: Tkinter is a standard GUI toolkit for Python. It is included with most Python installations and is widely used for building desktop applications in Python.
Core Features: Cross-Platform Gui Toolkit, Simple & Easy To Use, Supports Various Widgets Like Buttons, Labels, Textboxes, Etc., Integration With Python Programming Language, Extensive Documentation & Community Support
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
